DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ENERGY
DOC.TEXT: Kenetech Completes Financing for Two Energy Projects : The company said Nations Financial Capital Corp . of Stamford , Conn. , has acquired a 25 % stake in two Kenetech Windpower projects in California and Minnesota . San Francisco-based Kenetech Corp. , which provides electric-power products and services , in January announced an $ 82-million limited partnership to finance two wind-energy plants that sell electricity to Southern California Edison Co . and Northern States Power Co . of Minnesota . LG & E Energy Corp . of Louisville , Ky. , and Allstate Project Finance of Northbrook , Ill. , hold a 75 % stake in the limited partnership .
